channel.title: Ipados 26 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ipados 26 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26 Tahoe, and Apple’s other OS updates launch September 15
item.description: If your device is supported, it’s getting Liquid Glass-ier later this month.

item.title: What to expect (and not expect) from yet another September Apple event
item.description: An all-new iPhone variant, plus a long list of useful (if predictable) upgrades.

item.title: Apple brings OpenAI’s GPT-5 to iOS and macOS
item.description: It’s unclear exactly how GPT-5’s new approach to model-switching will work here.

item.title: iPadOS 26 preview: The rare software update that makes (most) old hardware feel new
item.description: Public beta arrives today; here’s what we’ve found in our weeks of testing.

item.title: Apple Intelligence news summaries are back, with a big red disclaimer
item.description: Apple disabled news summaries earlier this year after they mangled headlines.

item.title: Apple sues YouTuber who leaked iOS 26’s new “Liquid Glass” software redesign
item.description: YouTuber claims to “have receipts” disproving Apple’s allegations.
